note.p: Birth: Thurso Castle, Caithness, Scotland (10 May 1754 )
Death: His house, George Street, Edinburgh (21 December 1835)
Education: High School, Edinburgh; Edinburgh, Glasgow and Oxford Universities

Career: Admitted to Lincoln's Inn (1774); Barrister (1782); established a Society for the improvement of British wool (1791); established the Board of Agriculture; Director, Bank of Scotland; Cashier of Excise
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1836 No 27 p 438
